name: Swipe
tag_list: real-time, sharing, location, social, shopping, deals, prices, reviews, friends
overview:
Swipe is a location based social platform where you can share what you are buying and find useful information about what others are buying around you. Swipe helps you answer the questions ?what did you buy?, ?where did you buy it? and ?how much did you pay for it?.

You can share the inside scoop on countless everyday purchases such as food, clothes, gadgets, furniture, books, tickets, gyms, cars, holiday packages, games etc. Swipe starts social conversations around purchases and helps you discover prices, deals, opinions, locations, stores, products and shoppers - all this in a fun and competitive game environment where you are accumulating money and owning stores to constantly increase your social status.

Today, you depend on a few friends, local media, and telephone carriers 411 service to get information on stores, products, prices and deals in your area. Even then, this information is partial, non-current and impersonal. Swipe is a social utility that disrupts this structure by providing free, completely transparent, up to date shopping information in your area from people you trust.
